name: Clif Bar Chocolate Chip Energy Bar
description:
With a taste and texture similar to home-baked goodies, this is a great-tasting, convenient source of energy for any activity.Ingredients: organic brown rice syrup, ClifPro® (soy rice crisps [soy protein isolate, rice flour, malt extract], organic soy flour, organic roasted soybeans), organic rolled oats, chocolate chips (organic evaporated cane juice, unsweetened chocolate, cocoa butter, soy lecithin, natural flavours), organic evaporated cane juice, organic soy butter, ClifCrunch® (apple fibre, oat fibre, organic milled flaxseed, chicory extract, psyllium), fig paste, raisins, natural flavours, sea salt, cinnamon.

        Sustainability
